scripts.setup-all: npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm run setup-models
scripts.clean-temp: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const tempDir = path.join(__dirname, 'temp'); if (fs.existsSync(tempDir)) { fs.readdirSync(tempDir).forEach(file => { try { fs.unlinkSync(path.join(tempDir, file)); } catch (e) { console.error(e); } }); console.log('Temp directory cleaned'); }"
